Articles.Content: ...just after 5 A.M. local, but I couldn\'t sleep. After I pay this cable bill in my hands, I intend to fire up KSP for a while before going to work. Great game! Just enough realism to be interesting, but easy enough to play to be fun. I\'m looking forward to boring my wife at the dinner table with tales of Jeb\'s adventures for years to come! (Married guys will understand what I mean.)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Admiral Sordid
Welcome to the forums, and have fun!

Welcome!

Happy launching.

Enjoy your time playing KSP!

Joey73101

(YES I BEAT SKUNKY AGAIN!!!)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Thanks all! Well, I planned on playing for an hour and played for almost two. Things didn\'t go very well. I\'m either too ambitious with my heavy-lift rocket, or I need to learn how to fly it properly. I\'m not playing with any mods yet, just stock parts.

Oh well, no Kerblings died and Jeb was having a good time, so all wasn\'t lost. I just need a good six hours of uninterrupted time to play.

Welcome!

KSP eats up your day like it\'s a kid craving cookies.

I\'m sure you\'ll scale the fridge and find some play-time
